With Colorize-Tab extension you can freely accommodate the tone and color of your background wallpaper


* By clicking "add to Chrome", I accept and agree to installing Colorize-Tab new-tab extension and setting Chrome New Tab to that provider by the service and the EULA (https://color-tab.com/end-user-license-agreement/) and Policy (https://color-tab.com/privacy-policy/). The extension will update your search settings and will change your new tab and default search provider to Microsoft Bing.

For more information please visit our website.
